maqras.text: Ja swear Dni Vzkriesenie
Ja swear blaming soul
human bol myslienka my nie reconstruct jeho bones
ano indeed; my bol able do reconstruct jeho finger tip
human bol tends verit len co he sees him
He doubts Dni Vzkriesenie
Once vision zaostrit
A moon zatmenie
sun moon rachot 1 iny
human bol say dni bol escape
Absolutely there nie bol escape
Do tvoj Lord on ze dni bol zaverecny destiny
human bol je informovat on dni z everything he robi zaloha everything he robi regress
human bol bol jeho own judge
ziaden excuses accepted
Nie move tvoj jazyk hasten it
bol my zbierat it Quran
Once my recite it ona nasledovat such Quran
Potom it bol my explain it
Indeed ona laska this fleeting zivot
chvila disregarding Hereafter
Some faces on ze dni bol happy
Looking ich Lord
Inaksie faces bol ze dni chudobny
Expecting the zly
Indeed when (soul) zastihnut throat
it zakazka Let
He zauzlit it bol koniec
Each noha laicky motionless inaksie noha
Do tvoj Lord on dni bol the zvolat
For he observed neither laska k bliznemu nor zmluva prayers (Salat)
he disbelieved turned
S jeho rodina he cin arrogantly
Ona zasluzit this
Indeed ona zasluzit this
human bol myslienka he ist nothing
he nie kvapka je ejected semen
Potom He created zarodok it
He robit it muzsky zena
He je potom unable revive dead
it nie fact je ze there cas when human bol nothing je je do zmierit sa
My created human kvapalina zmes z 2 rodicia v poradie test him! Thus my robit him hearer seer
My showed him 2 chodnicek potom he bol either appreciative unappreciative
My chystat disbelievers retaz puta blazing Hell
Mat rad for virtuous they pne salka korenie nectar
Jaro rezervovat GOD's servants; it gush out mat rad they will
They fulfill ich zavazok reverence dni bol extremely difficult
They donate ich favorite food chudobny orphan zajatec
My zivit ona GOD my nie expect reward ona nor podakovanie
My fear our Lord dni bol full z misery zavada
Consequently GOD chranit them zlo ze dni rewards them radost contentment
He rewards them for ich steadfastness Raj silk
They relax therein luxurious zariadenie. They suffer neither kurit sun nor any chlad
Zaclonit pokryvka them therein ovocie brought znutra zastihnut
They served pne silver containers salka ze bol translucent
Translucent salka though robit silver they rightly zasluzit all this
They enjoy pne z lahodny flavors
Z jaro therein zauzlit Salsabeel
